mapper.select: select * from mycar order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into mycar (carname, carprice, carcolor, carguip) values(#{carname},#{carprice},#{carcolor},#{carguip})
mapper.update: update mycar set carname=#{carname}, carprice=#{carprice}, carcolor=#{carcolor}, carguip=#{carguip} where num=#{num}
